There are currently 132 potential participants in DK LOG, 48 of whom have been confirmed as eligible. There are 125 participants who have been contacted and 7 who still need to be contacted.

There are currently 42 participants scheduled for (or have completed) their Wave 1 phone call, with a 33.60% scheduling success rate (number scheduled out of total contacted).

There are currently 57 participants who are interested, with 15 who still need to be scheduled.

Of those who were contacted, 45.60% were interested, and there are currently 7 participants whose interest in participating has not been determined yet.

So far, there are 50 potential participants from DHS Mailer, 49 of whom have been contacted. Of those who were contacted, 28 (57.14%) participants showed interest and 27 (55.10%) participants got scheduled successfully.

<<<<<<< HEAD ======= =======

There are currently 130 potential participants in DK LOG, 45 of whom have been confirmed as eligible. There are 122 participants who have been contacted and 8 who still need to be contacted.

There are currently 39 participants scheduled for (or have completed) their Wave 1 phone call, with a 31.97% scheduling success rate (number scheduled out of total contacted).

There are currently 54 participants who are interested, with 15 who still need to be scheduled.

Of those who were contacted, 44.26% were interested, and there are currently 8 participants whose interest in participating has not been determined yet.

So far, there are 49 potential participants from DHS Mailer, 48 of whom have been contacted. Of those who were contacted, 26 (54.17%) participants showed interest and 25 (52.08%) participants got scheduled successfully.
